name: Magical Battle Arena
description: Magical Battle Arena (Japanese: マジカルバトルアリーナ, Hepburn: Majikaru Batoru Arīna) is a crossover third-person shooter game developed by Fly-System in 2008. The game features characters from Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha, Magic Knight Rayearth, Cardcaptor Sakura, Slayers, and Mahōjin Guru Guru.
